mean_en: connected with the particular method you use to achieve something; carefully planned in order to achieve a particular aim; connected with military tactics; (especially of weapons) used or having an effect over short distances or for a short time
sentence: It takes a lot of tactical moves in order to win a game of chess.
sentence_trans: 要在国际象棋中获胜需要很多战略性的棋步。
word_etyma: tactic策略 + al形容词后缀 → tactical策略的
